Title: Does post-event cognitive load undermine thought suppression and increase intrusive memories after exposure to an analogue stressor?
Author: Nixon, Reginald D. V.; Cain, Neralie; Nehmy, Thomas; Seymour, Melanie
ExperimentalCondition: Block rehearsal task and thought suppression
ResultSummary: Both conditions did not significantly in terms of lab intrusions.

Title: To think or not to think about trauma? an experimental investigation into unconscious thought and intrusion development
Author: Krans, Julie;Bos, Maarten W.
ExperimentalCondition: Conscious thought (trauma recall + being told need film information)
ComparisonCondition: Control (2-back working memory task [being told the exp. has ended])
ResultSummary: Both conditions did not significantly in terms of intrusions.
Notes_fromMo: Intrusion content info Not Reported; Sample size info provided by author via email
